content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "lime_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "dropper", "quantity": 33, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a gray bed, I need to place 3 gray wool in the top row of the crafting table. Therefore I will start by moving 1 gray wool from slot 33 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "dropper", "quantity": 33, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: The birch planks have been crafted, so I will move them into a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "lime_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "dropper", "quantity": 33, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: The first step in crafting a gray bed is to move one of the gray_wools from slot 33 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "dropper", "quantity": 33, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I need to move another gray_wool from slot 33 to slot 2, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "gray_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "lime_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 21}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 10, "index": 22}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 34, "index": 23}, {"type": "crossbow", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 31}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "dropper", "quantity": 33, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
